# GENERATED BY: test/deps/executables_test.dart

## Section 0
$ tree
└── myapp
    ├── bin
    │   ├── bar.dart
    │   └── foo.dart
    ├── pubspec.lock
    └── pubspec.yaml

-------------------------------- END OF OUTPUT ---------------------------------

## Section 1
$ pub deps --executables
myapp: bar, foo

-------------------------------- END OF OUTPUT ---------------------------------

## Section 2
$ pub deps --executables --dev
myapp: bar, foo

-------------------------------- END OF OUTPUT ---------------------------------

## Section 3
$ pub deps --json
{
  "root": "myapp",
  "packages": [
    {
      "name": "myapp",
      "version": "0.0.0",
      "kind": "root",
      "source": "root",
      "dependencies": []
    }
  ],
  "sdks": [
    {
      "name": "Dart",
      "version": "3.1.2+3"
    }
  ],
  "executables": [
    ":bar",
    ":foo"
  ]
}
